text: We'll hear arguments next in 73-822, Fry and Boehm against the United States.
Mr Chief Justice, may it please the Court.

Do we not now on the presence under Davis-Bacon in effect to say to the States indirectly at least that you must pay the prevailing wage on any contracts, in which there's a contribution by the federal government?
Yes but again that's an -- that's a different matter than saying that the State of Ohio that you cannot pay tax collectors, judges, officials that have no counterpart in private industry at all.
